definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
to be stranded (of ship)/to run aground/fig. to run into difficulties and stop
deep or shallow/depth (of the sea)/limits of decorum
to explain a complicated subject matter in simple terms (idiom)/(of language) simple and easy to understand
shallow sea/sea less than 200 meters deep

sentences.english: Ground collapse is a common geological hazard in shallow buried karst area.
sentences.chinese: 地面塌陷是浅埋岩溶区常见的一种地质灾害。

sentences.english: Unsurprisingly, the product image and the bright orange buttons.
sentences.chinese: 毫无疑问，是产品图像和浅橙色的按钮。

sentences.english: And what's this brighter light blue-green ?
An impure oxide of cobalt, used to produce a blue color in enamel and in the making of smalt.
sentences.chinese: 浅的绿蓝色颜料，主要由钴和锡的氧化物组成。

sentences.english: The Qi of meridian infuses into the shallow depression of the elbow like water flowing into a marsh.
sentences.chinese: 经气流注至此，入曲肘浅凹处，犹如水进沼泽。

sentences.english: All limbs were performed with superficial venous operation and external valvuloplasty of femoral vein valve.
sentences.chinese: 所有肢体均行浅静脉手术加股静脉瓣膜外修复成形术。

sentences.english: Separate large amounts of leftovers into small, shallow containers.
sentences.chinese: 把大量的剩菜分开放进又小又浅的容器中。

sentences.english: Poem Wen-Yi simple, but the first sentence needs some explanation.
sentences.chinese: 此诗文义显浅，但首句需略加解释。

sentences.english: Rather, they should be flesh-coloured under white shirts.
sentences.chinese: 此外，白色职业装必须搭配浅肉色内衣裤。

sentences.english: Her light-gray paint job has dried.
sentences.chinese: 浅灰色的油漆已经风干。

sentences.english: Cantonese cuisine, the hardest to categorize, emphasizes light cooking with seemingly limitless range of ingredients.
sentences.chinese: 最难归类的粤菜强调轻炒浅煮，选料似乎不受限制。

sentences.english: Mine was balky and awkward, brand new, and of a light, common color.
sentences.chinese: 我的却硕大笨拙，簇新，颜色浅而平凡。

sentences.english: In addition, Chen et al gun advocates say that the press should be simple to use.
sentences.chinese: 另外，还有陈荣衮等人提倡报章宜改用浅说。

sentences.english: Conclusion EVLT is effective for patients with superficial varicosities of the lower extremities.
sentences.chinese: 结论腔内激光治疗下肢浅静脉曲张疗效可靠。

sentences.english: Fulla also has two female friends, Yasmine and Nada, with lighter hair.
sentences.chinese: 芙拉还有两个女伴，雅斯敏和娜达，她们的发色稍浅。

sentences.english: This hut was built over a shallow depression that was covered with a timber framework.
sentences.chinese: 该棚屋建于一处浅洼地上，上方是木质大梁。

definition: deep or shallow/depth (of the sea)/limits of decorum
insipid/diluted/weak/mild/light in color/tasteless/indifferent/(variant of 氮[dan4]) nitrogen

white/snowy/pure/bright/empty/blank/plain/clear/to make clear/in vain/gratuitous/free of charge/reactionary/anti-communist/funeral/to stare coldly/to write wrong character/to state/to explain/vernacular/spoken lines in opera
thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
meager/slight/weak/ungenerous or unkind/frivolous/to despise/to belittle/to look down on/to approach or near
thick/deep or profound/kind/generous/rich or strong in flavor/to favor/to stress
